climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: ART MODE: Enjoy your personal art exhibit when you’re not watching TV. Just switch on Art Mode.
QLED 4K TV WITH 100% COLOR VOLUME: Bask in a billion shades of brilliant color at 100% Color Volume, that stay true even in bright scenes.
ANTI-REFLECTION WITH MATTE DISPLAY: Enjoy more screen visibility with virtually no light reflection, night or day.
SLIM-FIT WALL MOUNT INCLUDED: Hang The Frame flush against the wall to look like an actual picture frame.
CUSTOMIZABLE BEZEL: Complement your style with the Customizable Bezel for The Frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this TV
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and shipper did an excellent job packaging the product!! I love all the art work we have access to. It definitely looks like framed art now instead of a TV screen which was the whole point. No more eye sore in the living room. My only regret is waiting too long to purchase. I went with 65” but going bigger would have been a good idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST TV
reviews.reviewText: headline says it all. this is our 4th frame and it's all we'll ever buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Service is HORRIBLE
reviews.reviewText: We have 6 Frames across our two houses. One failed…took a month to get it solved an not until we contacted the CEO of Samsung. Now we have had a second fail that we purchased through Amazon and my husband spent 2.5 hours trying to get support and no luck…horrible service loop. THE TECHNOLOGY FAILS AND THE SERVICE FAILS EVEN MORE. I think the Frame has challenges.And now we are told it is NOT under warranty as the TV is covered by the seller or Amazon and now we can’t get ahold of anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pictures quality are excellent and television fits so nicely on wall!Very stylish!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love this TV. It's the 2nd one I've purchased now. Looks fabulous as art (no need to pay for their subscription, if you can download it off the internet, you can upload it onto the tv). There is no reflection or glare.Works great as a TV as well. Sound and picture quality are great in my opinion.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really enjoyed it
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for my daughter, we loved it,.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great TV with a POS remote
reviews.reviewText: I love these TVs. This is my 4th art tv. The newer models include a remote without a charging cable but has solar charging capabilities. I think it’s ridiculous that Samsung doesn’t include the charging cable for the remote being that these TVs are quite expensive. It would be a non- issue if the solar charging panel actually worked. After 4 months, both remotes are dead despite ample time in sunlight to recharge, reset tv, de-pairing and re-pairing remotes to still be faulty. Quite annoying to be ordering a $10 charging cable that should have been included so I can try to resolve this POS remote issue. Also ordered a replacement remote in the event the original POS remote still doesn’t work. Just send a charging cable and save everything the frustration!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No free returns
reviews.reviewText: DONT BUY THIS TV. We ordered ours, it wouldn’t even turn on and then when we went to return it there were no free returns and it costed us $300 to return the item. Very disappointing. Feels like a scam.
